014package org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper;
015
016import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.JdbiConfig;
017
018/**
019 * Configuration class for MapEntryMapper.
020 */
021public class MapEntryMappers implements JdbiConfig<MapEntryMappers>, MapEntryConfig<MapEntryMappers> {
022    public MapEntryMappers() {}
023
024    private MapEntryMappers(MapEntryMappers that) {
025        this.keyColumn = that.keyColumn;
026        this.valueColumn = that.valueColumn;
027    }
028
029    private String keyColumn;
030    private String valueColumn;
031
032    @Override
033    public String getKeyColumn() {
034        return keyColumn;
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Sets the column that map entry keys are loaded from. If set, keys will be loaded from the given column, using the {@link ColumnMapper} registered
039     * for the key type. If unset, keys will be loaded using the {@link RowMapper} registered for the key type, from whichever columns that row mapper
040     * uses.
041     *
042     * @param keyColumn the key column name.
043     * @return this config object, for call chaining
044     */
045    @Override
046    public MapEntryMappers setKeyColumn(String keyColumn) {
047        this.keyColumn = keyColumn;
048        return this;
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public String getValueColumn() {
053        return valueColumn;
054    }
055
056    /**
057     * Sets the column that map entry values are loaded from. If set, values will be loaded from the given column, using the {@link ColumnMapper}
058     * registered for the value type. If unset, values will be loaded using the {@link RowMapper} registered for the value type, from whichever columns
059     * that row mapper uses.
060     *
061     * @param valueColumn the value column name.
062     * @return this config object, for call chaining
063     */
064    @Override
065    public MapEntryMappers setValueColumn(String valueColumn) {
066        this.valueColumn = valueColumn;
067        return this;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public MapEntryMappers createCopy() {
072        return new MapEntryMappers(this);
073    }
074}
